title: karuNAkarA karuNAkari
sahitya:
karuNAkarA karuNAkari pADinEn taruNam iduvE tiruvaruL purivAi


anupallavi

  karuNaikkaDalE gAnavAriyE aruNOdayanE Ananda rUpanE


caraNam    mAnilamIdinil mA perum pAvi nAn mAnuDar yArum en tanjam allavE
vAnavan nIyalAl pughaliDam uNDO tIyanEn ennai IDETriDuvAi
